A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form a posse to destroy the cat, and the cat ends up killing them. Well, until they grow horns and are resurrected to kill. It is a story of cycles and it is acted well, but the film itself is a little plodding. I'm torn, really,
